Detailed Description

The main class of the whole robot programm. All objects are created here. This method also starts the GUI.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Mrs::Mrs (  ) 

The main class of the whole robot programm.

All objects are created here. This method also starts the GUI.

Member Function Documentation

void Mrs::drive ( unsigned char  command  ) 

Instructs the robot to drive FORWARD, BACKWARD, LEFT and RIGHT. The commands START, STOP or WAIT are also possible.

Parameters:
command 

void Mrs::test (  ) 

The method for the test button in the GUI

void Mrs::speak ( QString  text  ) 

Speaks a text with festival. All HTML-Code in the parameter (text) is also removed internally).

Parameters:
text is the text to speak.

bool Mrs::simulationMode (  ) 

Returns the status of the main program. True, if the simulationMode ist active.

void Mrs::logicalUnit ( int  sensorAlarm  )  [slot]

The locialUnit handles the behavior of the robot. This slot is called if an obstacle is detected from the obstacleCheckThread. It lets the robot "react" depending on which sensor made the alarm. The number of alarms are also counted.

Parameters:
sensorAlarm consists of the sum of all infrared and ultrasonic sensor numbers, which had an alarm.

void Mrs::showSensorData (  )  [slot]

Shows the sensor data in a graphical way (progressBars) and as a number in the GUI. This slot is called from the Signal sensorDataComplete from the sensorThread.

void Mrs::showExitDialog (  )  [slot]

Shows the yes-no exit dialog for the main program. This slot is called when massive communication errors occur while talking to the robots interface!

void Mrs::enableRemoteControlListening ( bool  status  )  [slot]

Enables or disables the listening for the robot remote control. This slot is called from an event from the GUI (enable remote button).

Parameters:
status 

void Mrs::executeRemoteCommand ( QString  command  )  [slot]

This slot executes remote commands it receives via network (e.g. WLAN).

void Mrs::setSimulationMode ( bool  status  )  [slot]

This slot enables or disables the simulation mode.

Parameters:
status 

void Mrs::finishSplash (  )  [slot]

Finishes the splash screen and displays the main window.

bool Mrs::exitDialog

Configures if an exit dialog should be shown, when exiting the main program.
